description: Designed a responsive web application, with a HeadlessCMS approach, using GatsbyJS, ReactJS, ContentfulCMS, GraphQL and Snipcart as a payment gateway, for an online CoffeeSHop, to sell beverages online

Designed a responsive React Application with a Responsive UI to Track and Display Covid19 Cases, Globally and Country Specific in Numeric and Graphical format, with React Material UI components and Chart.js Charts

Designed a responsive web application using React JS, to retrieve and display Crypto Currency/Coin prices using the CryptoComapre API, along with the price history statistics, in Days/Weeks/Months and change in Days/Weeks/Months

Designed an IOT circuit, with sensors attached to individual Arduino circuits to read and report Soil pH(fertility), moisture & temperature values, to a Raspberry Pi 3, acting as a HUB. The Raspberry Pi will then upload all the data into the cloud

projectName: Blockchain using Python with RSA Encryption
description: Designed an IOT circuit, with sensors attached to individual Arduino circuits to read and report Soil pH(fertility), moisture & temperature values, to a Raspberry Pi 3, acting as a HUB. The Raspberry Pi will then upload all the data into the cloud
Designed a simple single page application for a blog using GatsbyJS, where the individual pages for the blog were generated using Markdown syntax, composed on a .mdx file
